description.full: Experience a whole new ball game with KONAMIâ€™s PES 2014. The stunning new FOX Engine has been combined with a revolutionary football syetem that puts the ball at the heart of the action for the first time. Every element has been rebuilt and now features all-new physics systems, bespoke team and player AI and a huge leap forward in animations and atmosphere. This test demo offers an early taste of the refined controls, and incredible depth that make PES2014 the game to beat.
description.short: Experience a first taste of a whole new ball game with PES 2014. Sample new dynamic physics, stunning visuals and rebuilt AI, all wrpped up with the award winning Fox engine.
